subject: Perl scripts
msgSnippet: Hi, I ve created a couple of perl scripts to help convert texts to unicode, they should work in a unixy environment and they might work in windows with a
messageBody:
Hi,

I've created a couple of perl scripts to help convert texts to unicode,
they should work in a unixy environment and they might work in windows
with a little persuasion.

roman2qs.pl - converts text into qs preserving unknown sequences (it's
just a glorified lookup table really), it needs a dictionary to be
appended before it is useful.
qsroman2unicode.pl - converts qs text which uses the old style mapping
to the new unicode mapping.

I'm not familiar with the old mapping so there are doubtless mistakes in
the substitutions qsroman2unicode.pl makes, please let me know if you
find them or modify the script yourself, in particular I couldn't find
the mapping for #20 WHY, so that's probably wrong.

I've included QS_Dict_Unicode.txt which is the dictionary from
QSConverter run through qsroman2unicode.pl, there will be issues with
this dictionary since qsroman2unicode.pl is suspect.

To get roman2qs.pl into a usable state run:

cat roman2qs.pl QS_Dict_Unicode.txt > roman2qs.new.pl
chmod +x roman2qs.new.pl

I hope someone finds these useful.


___________________________________________________________

Hi,

I've created a couple of perl scripts to help convert texts to unicode,
they should work in a unixy environment and they might work in windows
with a little persuasion.

roman2qs.pl - converts text into qs preserving unknown sequences (it's
just a glorified lookup table really), it needs a dictionary to be
appended before it is useful.
qsroman2unicode.pl - converts qs text which uses the old style mapping
to the new unicode mapping.

I'm not familiar with the old mapping so there are doubtless mistakes in
the substitutions qsroman2unicode.pl makes, please let me know if you
find them or modify the script yourself, in particular I couldn't find
the mapping for #20 WHY, so that's probably wrong.

I've included QS_Dict_Unicode.txt which is the dictionary from
QSConverter run through qsroman2unicode.pl, there will be issues with
this dictionary since qsroman2unicode.pl is suspect.

To get roman2qs.pl into a usable state run:

cat roman2qs.pl QS_Dict_Unicode.txt > roman2qs.new.pl
chmod +x roman2qs.new.pl

I hope someone finds these useful.
